bug.short_desc: [Subclipse] Null pointer exception due to unknown team provider

long_desc.thetext:
It seems that the Subclipse SVN connector does not have checks to filter out project with other team providers. This causes null pointer exceptions to appear when resolving projects (see below).
The solution is to put null guards to ignore those project providers.
